articles.title: NASA says its photo of a 'rainbow' on Mars is actually a lens flare - sorry - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The account for NASA's Perseverance rover tweeted the explanation on Tuesday and said many people had asked whether the photo showed a rainbow.
articles.content:
NASA released a photo of what looks like a rainbow on Mars but said it actually just shows a lens flare.
"Many have asked: Is that a rainbow on Mars?" the Twitter account of NASA's Perseverance rove… [+509 chars]

articles.title: Govt's six-year-old 'cost saving' tender website has now been down for weeks - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The Treasury e-tenders site was described as an important move towards efficient and fair procurement at its launch. There is no estimate for when it will be operational again.
articles.content:
• Government's e-tender website has been down for weeks, with little detail on why, or when it may be operational again.

articles.title: The youngest billionaire in the world right now is a teenager in Germany - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Forbes' 35th annual billionaires list knocked Kylie Jenner from its ranks and put 18-year-old Kevin David Lehmann in the top spot.
articles.content:
It's good to be Kevin David Lehman. 
Lehman, 18, is worth $3.3 billion after inheriting stakes in German drugstore chain dm-drogerie markt from his father, Guenther Lehmann. That's according to Forb… [+2158 chars]

articles.title: New vaccine plan in the works for South Africa: Mkhize - BusinessTech
articles.description: Health minister Dr Zweli Mkhize has announced that government has concluded an agreement with pharmaceutical company Pfizer for the delivery of 20 million Covid-19 vaccines.
articles.content:

articles.description: Hacking groups are using data scrapped from LinkedIn to build and execute spearphishing campaigns.
